snippet: A shooting at George Bush Intercontinental Airport in Houston produced tense scenes for travelers and the closing of a terminal. The police said one person had been shot and faced life-threatening injuries.
abstract: A shooting at George Bush Intercontinental Airport in Houston produced tense scenes for travelers and the closing of a terminal. The police said one person had been shot and faced life-threatening injuries.

headline.main: Tense Moments Described at Houston Airport After Shooting
